name: 甘奈
text:
えへへ、見て見て！　甘奈は
『Ａ　Ｌ　Ｓ……』
trans:
Ehehe, look!
I have the "A L S"...

name: 甜花
text:
わ……
なーちゃんのやつ……綺麗……
trans:
Ooh...
That one on Na-chan's... is so pretty...

name: 千雪
text:
ふふっ、私も──『Ｔ　Ｒ　О……』
次、『Ｅ』を忘れちゃダメなのよ？
trans:
Fufu, me too.
"T R O", For the next one, don't forget the "E", okay?

name: 甜花
trans:
O-Okay...!
"E M E"

name: 甘奈
text:
……わぁ……ほんと……！
目つむっても見えるよ、ALSTROEMERIA……！
trans: Aah... Even if I close my eyes, I can still see it! "ALSTROEMERIA"!

name: 甜花
text:
にへへ……楽しい……
あっ……でも、もう終わっちゃう……？
trans:
Nihehe, that was fun...
Ah... But, it's going to be over, right?

name: 甘奈
text: そうだね……たくさんは残ってないかな……
trans: Yeah... I guess there isn't much left...

name: 甘奈
trans: Hmm? I wonder what this is?

name: 甘奈
text:
……丸い……花火……？
甜花ちゃん、これなんだっけ？
trans:
A round firework?
What is this again, Tenka?

name: 甜花
trans: Huh? Tenka has no idea either...

name: 千雪
trans: Oh, a "mouse tail firework"!

name: 千雪
text:
これ、どこに行くかわからないから
ちょっと怖いけど、面白いの
trans:
This one's a little scary since
no one knows where it'll go but it's fun.

name: 甘奈
text:
思い出した！
甘奈たちも小さい頃にやった！
trans:
I remember now!
We even played it when we're kids!

name: 甘奈
text: 追い回される感じがして、逃げ回ってたっけ
trans: Like it feels you're being chased and you have to run away from it.

name: 甜花
trans: Yes... It was something like that...

name: 千雪
text: ふふ、小さい頃は怖く感じるよね
trans: Fufu, it does seem scary back when you were just a kid.

name: 甘奈
text:
千雪さんもなんだ！
やっぱりそうだよね～
trans:
I see that it's the same with you, Chiyuki!
It did feel that way.

name: 甘奈
text:
でも、さすがに今は成長してるから
どうってことなさそうだけどね☆
trans: But, we've all grown up now so it's no big thing.

name: 甜花
trans: Yes!

name: 千雪
text:
なら、みんな久しぶりってことで……
やってみましょうか♪
trans: Since it's been quite some time, how about we try lighting one?

name: 甘奈＆甜花
trans: Okay!

name: 千雪
text: それじゃあ火を点けて……
trans: I'll be lighting it now.

name: 千雪
trans: There!

name: 甘奈
trans: Say, it doesn't seem to be moving.

name: 千雪
trans: Yes, at first.

name: 甜花
trans: Ah!

name: 甜花
trans: It has started... to spin...

name: 千雪
trans: Ah! It's starting to move towards you, Amana!

name: 甘奈
trans: What!

name: 甜花
trans: Na-chan!

name: 甘奈
trans: Kyaa!

name: 千雪
trans: Are you alright, Amana?

name: 甘奈
text:
うん、全然へーき！
ちょっと驚いただけだよ！
trans:
Yeah, I'm fine!
Just a little surpised.

name: 甘奈
text:
やっぱり全然怖くなかったね☆
むしろ、ちょっとドキドキして楽しかった！
trans:
It really isn't scary.
Or rather, it kinda make my heart jump a little and it's fun!

name: 甜花
text:
甜花も……！　びっくり……したけど……
怖くは……なかった……にへへ
trans: Tenka thinks so too!  Tenka was surpised by it... but it's not scary...  Nihehe...

name: 甘奈
text: そうだ！　さっき見た時にまだいくつか残ってたよ！
trans: That reminds me! There's a few more of them remaining when I last checked!

name: 甘奈
trans: Let's see... There's exactly three left!

name: 千雪
text: せっかくだから、残りもやっちゃわない……？
trans: How about we light all the remaining one while we're at it?

name: 甜花
trans: Yes.

name: 甘奈
trans: I agree.

name: 甘奈
text:
ねぇねぇ、今度は３ついっぺんに点けてみない？
さっきよりドキドキしそう！
trans:
Say, how about we light them all at the same time?
It's going to be much more exciting that way!

name: 甜花
trans: How brave of you... Na-chan...

name: 千雪
trans: Yes, that looks fun.

name: 甘奈
text: 決まりっ！　じゃあ１つずつ配るね！
trans: It's decided then! I'll be handing each of us one mouse tail firework!

name: 甜花
trans: Nihehe, thank you.

name: 千雪
text: ありがとう、甘奈ちゃん
trans: Thank you, Amana.

name: 甘奈
text: どういたしまして☆　じゃあ、火を点けて……
trans: You're welcome. Okay, let's light them up.

name: 甘奈
trans: There!

name: 甘奈
text: さ……さすがに３つだと……迫力あるね……！
trans: A-As you'd expect from three mouse tail fireworks. They sure have some intensity!

name: 千雪
trans: Maybe we over did it this time?

name: 甜花
trans: Ah! The three of them... are going in this direction...

name: 甜花
text: ……な、なーちゃん！　千雪さん！　どうしよ……！？
trans: N-Na-chan! Chiyuki! What should we do?

name: 甘奈＆千雪
trans: Alright!

name: 甘奈
text: 甜花ちゃん、左手、繋いで！
trans: Tenka, give me your left hand!

name: 千雪
trans: And I'll hold your right hand♪

name: 甜花
trans: Eh? Okay.

name: 甘奈
text: 爆発する前にみんなで逃げるよ！
trans: Let's run away before it blows up!

name: 甘奈
trans: Go!
